EmailTemplate.description: SSSW - Used to notify the employee when a Case origin from Snap It has been closed.
EmailTemplate.name: SSSW Case Closed Notification-Snap It Employee
EmailTemplate.subject: Case: {!Case.CaseNumber} has been Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Product or service enquiry
Reference {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear {!Case.Employee_Firstname__c},
The enquiry you raised through Snap It for {!Case.PrimaryContactFirstName__c} {!Case.PrimaryContactLastName__c}, has now been resolved.
Should you require any further assistance for this case, please simply reply to this email.
Thank you for using our service.
Thank you, Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}
